languages.text: "Алая длань. Мародеры, сумасшедшие, еретики... нечестивцы, покусившиеся на дары, уготованные Богу-Императору — тела тех, кто завершил свой прижизненный труд. А когда не могут найти замерзшие трупы — убивают нас!"

traits.locale_text: "Алая длань. Мародеры, сумасшедшие, еретики... нечестивцы, покусившиеся на дары, уготованные Богу-Императору — тела тех, кто завершил свой прижизненный труд. А когда не могут найти замерзшие трупы — убивают нас!"

languages.text: "The Crimson Hand. Marauders, heretics and madmen... The apostates who stole the gifts prepared for God-Emperor — the bodies of those who finished their lifelong labour. And when they cannot find frozen corpses, it is us they come for!"
languages.original_text: "Алая длань. Мародеры, сумасшедшие, еретики... нечестивцы, покусившиеся на дары, уготованные Богу-Императору — тела тех, кто завершил свой прижизненный труд. А когда не могут найти замерзшие трупы — убивают нас!"

"The Crimson Hand. Marauders, heretics and madmen... The apostates who stole the gifts prepared for God-Emperor — the bodies of those who finished their lifelong labour. And when they cannot find frozen corpses, it is us they come for!"

languages.text: 「深紅の手。マローダー、異端者、狂人…神帝陛下のために用意された贈り物を奪った背教者たち。生涯の苦労を終えた者たちの体。そして、凍った死体を見つけられないとき、奴らは私たちを襲うのだ！」
languages.original_text: "The Crimson Hand. Marauders, heretics and madmen... The apostates who stole the gifts prepared for God-Emperor — the bodies of those who finished their lifelong labour. And when they cannot find frozen corpses, it is us they come for!"

traits.locale_text: 「深紅の手。マローダー、異端者、狂人…神帝陛下のために用意された贈り物を奪った背教者たち。生涯の苦労を終えた者たちの体。そして、凍った死体を見つけられないとき、奴らは私たちを襲うのだ！」

languages.text: « La Main Écarlate. Des maraudeurs, des fous et des hérétiques... Les apostats qui ont volé les présents destinés à l'Empereur-Dieu : les corps de ceux ayant achevé le labeur d'une vie. Et quand ils ne parviennent pas à trouver des cadavres gelés, c'est sur nous qu'ils se rabattent ! »
languages.original_text: "The Crimson Hand. Marauders, heretics and madmen... The apostates who stole the gifts prepared for God-Emperor — the bodies of those who finished their lifelong labour. And when they cannot find frozen corpses, it is us they come for!"

traits.locale_text: « La Main Écarlate. Des maraudeurs, des fous et des hérétiques... Les apostats qui ont volé les présents destinés à l'Empereur-Dieu : les corps de ceux ayant achevé le labeur d'une vie. Et quand ils ne parviennent pas à trouver des cadavres gelés, c'est sur nous qu'ils se rabattent ! »

languages.text: “是绯红之手，那群四处劫掠的异端分子……那些疯子偷走了为神皇准备的礼物。那些辛辛苦苦工作一辈子的人，他们的尸体本该得到安息，可那群疯子却偷走了尸体。如果找不到冻僵的尸体，他们就会来找我们！”
languages.original_text: "The Crimson Hand. Marauders, heretics and madmen... The apostates who stole the gifts prepared for God-Emperor — the bodies of those who finished their lifelong labour. And when they cannot find frozen corpses, it is us they come for!"

traits.locale_text: “是绯红之手，那群四处劫掠的异端分子……那些疯子偷走了为神皇准备的礼物。那些辛辛苦苦工作一辈子的人，他们的尸体本该得到安息，可那群疯子却偷走了尸体。如果找不到冻僵的尸体，他们就会来找我们！”

languages.text: «La Mano Carmesí. Invasores, herejes y pirados... Los apóstatas que robaron los dones preparados para el Dios Emperador. Los cadáveres de quienes zanjaron su perpetua labor. Y cuando no encuentran cadáveres congelados, ¡vienen a por nosotros!».
languages.original_text: "The Crimson Hand. Marauders, heretics and madmen... The apostates who stole the gifts prepared for God-Emperor — the bodies of those who finished their lifelong labour. And when they cannot find frozen corpses, it is us they come for!"

traits.locale_text: «La Mano Carmesí. Invasores, herejes y pirados... Los apóstatas que robaron los dones preparados para el Dios Emperador. Los cadáveres de quienes zanjaron su perpetua labor. Y cuando no encuentran cadáveres congelados, ¡vienen a por nosotros!».

languages.text: "Die Purpurne Hand. Plünderer, Ketzer und Wahnsinnige ... Die Apostaten, welche die Geschenke für den Gottimperator gestohlen haben — die Leichen derer, die ihre lebenslange Arbeit abgeschlossen hatten. Und wenn sie keine gefrorenen Leichen finden, kommen sie uns holen!"
languages.original_text: "The Crimson Hand. Marauders, heretics and madmen... The apostates who stole the gifts prepared for God-Emperor — the bodies of those who finished their lifelong labour. And when they cannot find frozen corpses, it is us they come for!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Purpurne Hand. Plünderer, Ketzer und Wahnsinnige ... Die Apostaten, welche die Geschenke für den Gottimperator gestohlen haben — die Leichen derer, die ihre lebenslange Arbeit abgeschlossen hatten. Und wenn sie keine gefrorenen Leichen finden, kommen sie uns holen!"

languages.text: "Kızıl El. Yağmacılar, kâfirler, deliler... Tanrı İmparator'a hazırlanan hediyeleri, hayat boyu süren hizmetlerinin sonuna gelenlerin bedenlerini çalan sapkınlar. Donmuş ceset bulamadıklarında bize dadanıyorlar!"
languages.original_text: "The Crimson Hand. Marauders, heretics and madmen... The apostates who stole the gifts prepared for God-Emperor — the bodies of those who finished their lifelong labour. And when they cannot find frozen corpses, it is us they come for!"

traits.locale_text: "Kızıl El. Yağmacılar, kâfirler ve deliler... Tanrı İmparator için hazırlanan hediyeleri, hayat boyu süren hizmetlerinin sonuna gelenlerin bedenlerini çalan sapkınlar. Donmuş ceset bulamadıklarında bize dadanıyorlar!"
